item.description:
Greetings everyone,

I'm pleased to announce a new meeting to be held at new member Michael DeSouza's iPhone focused firm Tap Tapas. Maybe you've heard of them... http://www.taptapas.c...

They've built some great looking apps --> I'm personally fond of their sense of humor, as evidenced in their history blurb and in their Art Slides app).

Michael has offered to share some thoughts on the business / marketing end of things and tell us about his company, which happens to be looking for talent right now.

namely:
an Objective C programer(s) - full time
a Web designer - freelance/ part time / full time
a PHP developer - freelance / part time

Michael encourages anyone interested in working with Tap Tapas to bring a resume/salary requirements along.

- - - - - - -

Other than that presentation/conversation, which I think might last at least 90 minutes, might anyone else have an urge to share something technical you've grasped? Or maybe a specific technical issue for which you could use some help?

If so: please let me know in advance, if possible.
Hopefully: the Tap Tapas folks will serve up some yummy finger food in line with their yummy name and tagline.

either way: I hope you can make it.
Brian
item.name: Let us meet at Tap Tapas
